title: Leblanc balanced or broken
body: Also please explain why or why not.

replies.body: Her chain length should not be as long as it is, especially for how much mobility she has. Also she needs a small delay before she can port back to her w or w/r. Too much safety.

> [{quoted}](name=WorksAtAGayBar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ydyXBinB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-03T23:18:21.197+0000)
>
> Her chain length should not be as long as it is, especially for how much mobility she has. Also she needs a small delay before she can port back to her w or w/r. Too much safety.

this pretty much. it's way too much for the burst shes capable of
